mapper.select: Select q.ppt_no AS pptNo, u.user_name AS userName, q.created_date AS createdDate, q.q_message As qMessage, q.qna_q_no AS qnaQNo, c.class_name AS className from b_q q, b_user u, b_class c where q.to_who_no = (select user_no from b_user where user_id= #{receiverId } ) and c.class_no = q.class_no and u.user_no = q.from_user_no order by created_date desc
